title: Two remarks on spaces of maps between operads of little cubes. (arXiv:2211.00908v2 [math.AT] UPDATED)
description: We record two facts on spaces of derived maps between the operads $E_d$ of little $d$-cubes. Firstly, these mapping spaces are equivalent to the mapping spaces between the non-unitary versions of $E_d$. Secondly, all endomorphisms of $E_d$ are automorphisms. We also discuss variants for localisations of $E_d$ and for versions with tangential structures.
dc:creator: Geoffroy Horel, Manuel Krannich, Alexander Kupers
